section.title: Restoring Values
section.p: Clicking Load Default (the icon to the left of the value field) replaces the custom value of the corresponding setting with the default value. Click Save to apply your changes.
Clicking Load Defaults (at the top of the page) deletes all custom values and loads the default values for all settings.
section.note: If style changes obscure the interface, an administrator can also reset specific settings by loading a URL with the following format: https://<hcf-URL>/#settings/console/reset/setting_name To reset a value to its default setting, replace setting_name with one of the variables above.
